this_title: Bebia, Babua, Anzorik, Me and Mom
trans_title: 祖母，祖父，安佐里奇，我和妈妈
introduction: 一个格鲁吉亚家庭在俄罗斯一天的生活。吉亚今天过生日，他今天就要9岁了！他和他的祖母、祖父和叔叔安佐里奇住在一起。但一切并没有按照所预想的进行着，吉亚许下了他内心深处最真挚的愿望。One day in the life of a Georgian family in Russia. Giya is having a birthday. Today he turns 9 years old! He lives with his grandmother, grandfather and uncle Anzorik. But things don't go as planned, Giya makes his deepest wish.
chinese_title: 祖母，祖父，安佐里奇，我和妈妈
foreign_title: Bebia, Babua, Anzorik, Me and Mom
